cloud-provider.usage: list of cloud providers to scan (${supportedProviders})

disable-full-descriptions.usage: disable request for full descriptions and use default vulnerability descriptions

exclude-categories.usage:
exclude categories by providing its name
cannot be provided with query inclusion flags
${sliceInstructions}
example: 'Access control,Best practices'

exclude-paths.usage:
exclude paths from scan
supports glob and can be provided multiple times or as a quoted comma separated string
example: './shouldNotScan/*,somefile.txt'

exclude-queries.usage:
exclude queries by providing the query ID
cannot be provided with query inclusion flags
${sliceInstructions}
example: 'e69890e6-fce5-461d-98ad-cb98318dfc96,4728cd65-a20c-49da-8b31-9c08b423e4db'

bom.usage: include bill of materials (BoM) in results output

experimental-queries.usage: include experimental queries (queries not yet thoroughly reviewed)

fail-on.usage:
which kind of results should return an exit code different from 0
accepts: critical, high, medium, low and info
example: "high,low"

ignore-on-exit.usage:
defines which kind of non-zero exits code should be ignored
accepts: all, results, errors, none
example: if 'results' is set, only engine errors will make KICS exit code different from 0

include-queries.usage:
include queries by providing the query ID
cannot be provided with query exclusion flags
${sliceInstructions}
example: 'e69890e6-fce5-461d-98ad-cb98318dfc96,4728cd65-a20c-49da-8b31-9c08b423e4db'

input-data.usage: path to query input data files

path.usage:
paths or directories to scan
example: "./somepath,somefile.txt"

payload-lines.usage: adds line information inside the payload when printing the payload file

payload-path.usage: path to store internal representation JSON file

preview-lines.usage: number of lines to be display in CLI results (min: 1, max: 30)

report-formats.usage: formats in which the results will be exported (${supportedReports})

secrets-regexes-path.usage: path to secrets regex rules configuration file

timeout.usage: number of seconds the query has to execute before being canceled

type.usage:
case insensitive list of platform types to scan
(${supportedPlatforms})
cannot be provided with type exclusion flags

exclude-type.usage:
case insensitive list of platform types not to scan
(${supportedPlatforms})
cannot be provided with type inclusion flags

terraform-vars-path.usage: path where terraform variables are present

exclude-gitignore.usage: disables the exclusion of paths specified within .gitignore file

enable-openapi-refs.usage: resolve the file reference, on OpenAPI files

parallel.usage: number of workers per platform enabled for parallel scanning (default set to 0 to auto-detect optimal number of workers)

max-file-size.usage: max file size permitted for scanning, in MB

old-severities.usage: uses old severities in query results
